subject: resource/Citizen_Kane
object: Poster showing two women in the bottom left of the picture looking up towards a man in a white suit in the top right of the picture. "Everybody's talking about it. It's terrific!" appears in the top right of the picture. "Orson Welles" appears in block letters between the women and the man in the white suit. "Citizen Kane" appears in red and yellow block letters tipped 60° to the right. The remaining credits are listed in fine print in the bottom right.
human_readable: The alternative poster for Citizen Kane features a design with two women looking up at a man in a white suit, with captions such as 'Everybody's talking about it. It's terrific!' and credits.
